attributes.action: Please Cover All Clinically Vulnerable Asthmatics in Covid Vaccine Groups 1-9
attributes.additional_details: Because until Saturday the 13th February 2021, these vulnerable people were in group 6 and now it seems the goalposts have moved and it’s not acceptable.
attributes.background: We want all asthmatics using steroid inhailors who are currently eligible for a flu jab to be included in group 6 of the Covid-19 priority list.

rejection.details:
Decisions about who is clinically extremely vulnerable is a clinical decision, not the responsibility of the Government or House of Commons.

We could accept a petition calling for people who are judged at moderate risk (clinically vulnerable) from Covid-19 to be given increased priority in the Covid-19 vaccination programme, if that is what you want to happen.
